long_description: Ideal for use with the Reliance Luggable Loo(R) (sold separately) and other portable toilets, these waste bags ease disposal. Double-bag system features an inner waste bag with a sealable, leakproof outer bag. Includes six complete bags. Be sure to always dispose of waste in an approved manner.
short_description: Ideal for use with the Reliance Luggable Loo(R) (sold separately) and other portable toilets, these waste bags ease disposal.
